title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if a build has already been done automatically.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should not be enabled if a build has already been done automatically.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Perform an automatic build. 3. Right-click in the editor and open the context sensitive popup menu. The 'Build' action should still be enabled, but it should not be.
